metadata.synopsis: Dalyria and Petras at the flophouse.They are looking for Astarion at the place where they used to "hunt".This is a dialog for when they meet Astarion-Avatar or Astarion-Companion with the player-Avatar.They will tell Astarion they must inform Cazador that Astarion is back in the city. They will also reveal that Cazador is planning a ritual that requires all the spawn and that will grant them new powers.If Astarion knows that Cazador is actually planning to sacrifice all the spawn, he might be able to convince the spawn about this sacrifice. In exchange, they will reveal a bit of information about Cazador's Palace.After the dialog, they disappear as clouds of mist.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Origin Debug Book (Ctrl+Shift+7)Astarion - Recruit - As Avatar (for AOM) or Companion (for COM)Astarion - Act 3 Origin Moments - Vampire Spawns Duo at FlophouseWalk in the direction the player character is facing.Click on Petra or Dalyria.

29.speaker: Narrator
29.text: *You know these people. Spawn, bound to Cazador, just as you once were.*
29.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion grabs Petras by the throat and drags him over towards the window. Standing full in the daylight, Astarion slowly pulls Petras closer and closer to the sunbeam.

151.speaker: Pale Petras
151.text: We'll leave for the Black Mass soon. I only need one more mark.
151.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion grabs Petras by the throat and drags him over towards the window. Standing full in the daylight, Astarion slowly pulls Petras closer and closer to the sunbeam.

9.speaker: Dalyria
9.text: We don't need another - the master said we have enough.
9.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion grabs Petras by the throat and drags him over towards the window. Standing full in the daylight, Astarion slowly pulls Petras closer and closer to the sunbeam.

147.speaker: Pale Petras
147.text: It's not for the master - it's for me. I spent one hundred years eating rats and dogs, but soon I'll be free to feast.
147.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion grabs Petras by the throat and drags him over towards the window. Standing full in the daylight, Astarion slowly pulls Petras closer and closer to the sunbeam.

67.speaker: Pale Petras
67.text: I want someone there, ready for me. Once the Mass is done and our master grants us our freedom, I'll want a drink.
67.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion grabs Petras by the throat and drags him over towards the window. Standing full in the daylight, Astarion slowly pulls Petras closer and closer to the sunbeam.

4.speaker: Astarion
4.text: What Black Mass? What's Cazador planning?
4.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion grabs Petras by the throat and drags him over towards the window. Standing full in the daylight, Astarion slowly pulls Petras closer and closer to the sunbeam.

90.speaker: Dalyria
90.text: The Black Mass will be the master's greatest triumph. The ritual will see him ascend to power no vampire has ever known.

65.speaker: Dalyria
65.text: And he promises that once he has ascended, he will give us our freedom.

17.speaker: Astarion
17.text: There won't be any Black Mass - I'm going to kill Cazador.
17.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion grabs Petras by the throat and drags him over towards the window. Standing full in the daylight, Astarion slowly pulls Petras closer and closer to the sunbeam.

1.speaker: Dalyria
1.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion grabs Petras by the throat and drags him over towards the window. Standing full in the daylight, Astarion slowly pulls Petras closer and closer to the sunbeam.

25.speaker: Pale Petras
25.text: But it is. And as arrogant as ever.
25.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion grabs Petras by the throat and drags him over towards the window. Standing full in the daylight, Astarion slowly pulls Petras closer and closer to the sunbeam.

70.speaker: Pale Petras
70.text: You can't raise a hand to the master, let alone kill him.
70.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion grabs Petras by the throat and drags him over towards the window. Standing full in the daylight, Astarion slowly pulls Petras closer and closer to the sunbeam.

6.speaker: Astarion
6.text: You have no idea what I can do.
6.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion grabs Petras by the throat and drags him over towards the window. Standing full in the daylight, Astarion slowly pulls Petras closer and closer to the sunbeam.

166.speaker: Dalyria
166.text: Brother, please, just come home with us. There is no need to fight.

149.speaker: Astarion
149.text: If you still serve him, I'll kill you too.
149.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion grabs Petras by the throat and drags him over towards the window. Standing full in the daylight, Astarion slowly pulls Petras closer and closer to the sunbeam.

36.speaker: Dalyria
36.text: Brother! You know we have no choice in this.
36.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion grabs Petras by the throat and drags him over towards the window. Standing full in the daylight, Astarion slowly pulls Petras closer and closer to the sunbeam.

39.speaker: Pale Petras
39.text: Don't be an idiot, Dal. He's all talk - always has been.
39.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion grabs Petras by the throat and drags him over towards the window. Standing full in the daylight, Astarion slowly pulls Petras closer and closer to the sunbeam.

118.speaker: Pale Petras
118.text: Go on, 'brother'. Show us what you can do.
118.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion grabs Petras by the throat and drags him over towards the window. Standing full in the daylight, Astarion slowly pulls Petras closer and closer to the sunbeam.

145.speaker: Astarion
145.text: Grab him by the throat and drag him towards the sunlight coming through the window.
145.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion grabs Petras by the throat and drags him over towards the window. Standing full in the daylight, Astarion slowly pulls Petras closer and closer to the sunbeam.

51.speaker: Pale Petras
51.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion grabs Petras by the throat and drags him over towards the window. Standing full in the daylight, Astarion slowly pulls Petras closer and closer to the sunbeam.

18.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion grabs Petras by the throat and drags him over towards the window. Standing full in the daylight, Astarion slowly pulls Petras closer and closer to the sunbeam.

73.context: CinematicNodeContext: Petras is starting to burn in the light

87.speaker: Pale Petras
87.context: CinematicNodeContext: Petras is starting to burn in the light

83.speaker: Astarion
83.text: Tell me what I need to know, or I swear you'll burn.

105.speaker: Dalyria
105.text: Astarion, please! I'll tell you everything - just release him!

169.speaker: Astarion
169.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion releases his hold on Petras's throat - he staggers away from the light coming through the window, doubled-over as he catches his breath

168.text: There's a defiled chapel under the master's palace - hidden there the entire time. That's where he's preparing the Black Mass.
168.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion releases his hold on Petras's throat - he staggers away from the light coming through the window, doubled-over as he catches his breath

132.text: There's a defiled chapel under the master's palace - hidden there the entire time. That's where he's preparing the Black Mass.
132.context: NodeContext: recovering from Astarion's assault, shocked and scared

144.speaker: Dalyria
144.text: There's a defiled chapel under the master's palace - hidden there the entire time. That's where he's preparing the Black Mass.
144.context: NodeContext: recovering from Astarion's assault, shocked and scared

126.speaker: Pale Petras
126.text: What the hells happened to you? What are you?
126.context: NodeContext: recovering from Astarion's assault, shocked and scared

163.speaker: Astarion
163.context: NodeContext: Resentful - still sore from being choked

50.speaker: Astarion
50.context: NodeContext: Resentful - still sore from being choked

159.speaker: Dalyria
159.text: Whatever changed you, brother - whatever you have become - the master still wants you. He will not stop looking for you.
159.context: NodeContext: Resentful - still sore from being choked

101.speaker: Pale Petras
101.text: We'll see you soon, Astarion. I'm going to remember this.
101.context: NodeContext: Resentful - still sore from being choked

117.speaker: Astarion
117.text: The greatest vampire that ever lived.

167.speaker: Astarion
167.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion forces Petra's face further into the sunlight streaming through the window. Smoke starts to rise from Petras' face.

55.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion forces Petra's face further into the sunlight streaming through the window. Smoke starts to rise from Petras' face.

34.speaker: Pale Petras
34.context: CinematicNodeContext: Held in the sunlight by Astarion, smoke starts to rise from Petras' face. He roars in pain.NodeContext: A vampire being burned by the sunlight

12.speaker: Pale Petras
12.context: NodeContext: In pain, being burned by the sun

146.speaker: Dalyria
146.text: How could you turn on us? We're family.
146.context: NodeContext: Can't believe what Astarion's done, stress on 'family'

122.text: I'm gonna find you when the Mass is done, brother. Then you'll see what real power looks like.
122.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion releases Petras, tossing him back to original stage setting, standing by Dalyria

33.speaker: Pale Petras
33.text: I'm gonna find you when the Mass is done, brother. Then you'll see what real power looks like.
33.context: NodeContext: Recovering from Astarion (his brother) choking and burning him.

19.context: CinematicNodeContext: Both vampire spawn turn to mist and vanish, leaving just Astarion and the party in the room

110.speaker: Astarion
110.text: I'm the master now and you will obey.

156.speaker: Astarion
156.text: The sun can't harm me anymore.

62.text: You're still the runt of the litter, Astarion. Nothing's changed.
62.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion tries to grab Petras, but he pushes him back and bares his fangs

91.text: You're still the runt of the litter, Astarion. Nothing's changed.
91.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion tries to grab Petras, but he pushes him back and bares his fangs

86.speaker: Pale Petras
86.text: You're still the runt of the litter, Astarion. Nothing's changed.

35.speaker: Dalyria
35.text: I can't believe you'd turn on us - on your own family.

164.speaker: Astarion
164.text: Listen to me, damn it! I'm trying to save you, even if you're too stupid to see it.

15.text: You... you really think the master would kill us?

154.speaker: Dalyria
154.text: You... you really think the master would kill us?

114.speaker: Pale Petras
114.text: Don't listen to him, Dal. We've been loyal - we've earned our reward. Unlike the runaway.

80.speaker: Dalyria
80.text: But when has the master ever rewarded us? When has he given us anything? And now he offers us freedom?

112.speaker: Pale Petras
112.text: You believe this? You believe that most self-centred, arrogant, egotistical one of us all is here to save the day?

16.speaker: Pale Petras
16.text: When has Astarion ever done anything that isn't in his own self-interest?

109.speaker: Astarion
109.text: I admit, I wasn't the best brother to you, so let me make it up to you. Let me save you.

3.speaker: Pale Petras
3.text: No, you were a piece of shit. And you're still a piece of shit.

38.speaker: Pale Petras
38.text: Let's go. We don't need to listen to this.

78.speaker: Astarion
78.text: It's in all of our interests to see Cazador dead. We'll all be free.

94.speaker: Pale Petras
94.text: You're lying - it can't be done.

107.speaker: Astarion
107.text: Dalyria, I know you're smarter than this. Tell me what I need to know.

8.speaker: Pale Petras
8.text: You're wasting your breath. We won't tell you anything.

5.speaker: Dalyria
5.text: Cazador's in the defiled chapel - beneath the palace.

106.speaker: Dalyria
106.text: The chapel has been there forever - hidden from all. There will be a sacrifice -
106.context: NodeContext: Full sentence: "there will be a sacrifice and then the master will ascend", but gets cut off by Petra

160.speaker: Pale Petras
160.text: Enough! Before you get us flayed alive.

123.speaker: Dalyria
123.text: Please, Astarion. If you're telling the truth, please help us.

7.speaker: Pale Petras
7.text: He's not telling the truth! And we don't need his help.

46.speaker: Pale Petras
46.text: This isn't over. We'll see you again, 'brother'.

2.speaker: Astarion
2.text: Walk to the window, into the sunlight.
2.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion moves to the window and turns his face to the sun, smiling, then turns back to the vampire spawn. They're shocked.

41.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion moves to the window and turns his face to the sun, smiling, then turns back to the vampire spawn. They're shocked.

158.speaker: Dalyria
158.context: NodeContext: Seeing Astarion standing in the sun without bursting into flames as a vampire should

116.speaker: Pale Petras
116.text: It's a trick - some glamour or spell. True power only comes from the master, and it will be ours soon.
116.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion steps out of the sunlight and returns to his original staging/position.NodeContext: Shocked, trying to justify what he's just seen and reassure himself

13.speaker: Astarion
13.text: Fine, go and die for your master if that's what you want.

108.speaker: Dalyria
108.text: How could you say such things? We're family.

40.speaker: Pale Petras
40.text: He's not our family. Not anymore.

0.speaker: Pale Petras
0.text: We'll see you again, Astarion. This isn't over.

59.speaker: Astarion
59.text: Nothing. Die if you want to, Petras.

21.speaker: Dalyria
21.text: Don't seek him, brother, please. He was so angry when you left.

136.speaker: Pale Petras
136.text: Show your face in the palace again and he'll punish you - destroy you.

64.speaker: Astarion
64.text: He'll destroy all of you if the Black Mass goes ahead.

61.speaker: Pale Petras
61.text: As if you'd know the first thing about the master's plans. He's going to give us freedom - he's going to give us power.

133.speaker: Astarion
133.text: When has Cazador given us anything other than beatings?

82.speaker: Pale Petras
82.text: I... I can't say you're wrong.

63.speaker: Dalyria
63.text: I... I can't say you're wrong.

44.speaker: Pale Petras
44.text: The master has always been... strict. But we're better for it.

57.speaker: Pale Petras
57.text: That's why we're worthy of freedom - of being elevated. And you're just a runt to be put down.

111.speaker: Astarion
111.text: Your only hope of freedom is his death. So tell me where he is.

143.speaker: Astarion
143.text: Believe what you want - I'm done with you.

52.text: You're just jealous. You lost your chance. You're not part of the family anymore.

60.speaker: Pale Petras
60.text: You're just jealous. You lost your chance. You're not part of the family anymore.

172.speaker: Pale Petras
172.text: And you never will be. Come for him if you're stupid enough - he'll be waiting.

141.speaker: Astarion
141.text: I can show you real power. Right now.

24.speaker: Pale Petras
24.text: You're all talk. You always were.

96.speaker: Astarion
96.text: You can be free without him. You can be powerful without him - I am the proof.

79.speaker: Pale Petras
79.text: You're proof of nothing. You're hiding in the shadows, just like the rest of us.

49.speaker: Dalyria
49.text: What if he's telling the truth, Petras? He is free.

85.speaker: Pale Petras
85.text: Free to be hunted like a dog.

10.speaker: Pale Petras
10.text: But if he is telling the truth, then he can prove it.

140.speaker: Astarion
140.text: You have no idea what I can do. Tell me where to find him or I'll make you pay.

48.speaker: Astarion
48.text: I'm not afraid of the old man.

120.speaker: Dalyria
120.text: Perhaps you should be. When the Black Mass is complete, he'll be stronger than ever.

20.speaker: Pale Petras
20.text: And once it's done, he'll give us our freedom. He'll give us power.

100.speaker: Astarion
100.text: Cazador won't free you - he's going to sacrifice you in the ritual.

157.speaker: Astarion
157.text: The 'Master' promised you freedom? And you believed him?

119.speaker: Astarion
119.text: Sounds like a delightful dinner plan. Perhaps I'll join you.

102.speaker: Pale Petras
102.text: You think you can just walk back in here with some stupid quip? On the eve of the master's ascension?

56.speaker: Astarion
56.text: I'll be blunt, then. Cazador plans to sacrifice us all at his 'ascension' ritual.

66.speaker: Astarion
66.text: Where is this ritual happening? Where can I find Cazador?

69.speaker: Pale Petras
69.text: Of course that's why he came crawling back. He wants to ascend with the rest of us.

53.speaker: Pale Petras
53.text: He heard about the ritual and the power our master will grant us, so he came back with his tail between his legs, hoping all would be forgiven.

97.speaker: Astarion
97.text: Tell me about this 'ascension' - what's Cazador planning?

75.speaker: Astarion
75.text: I'm going to kill Cazador. Just tell me where to find him.

23.speaker: Pale Petras
23.text: Now that's funny. And the best part is you actually believe it.

31.speaker: Astarion
31.text: I have more than quips. You have no idea what I'm capable of.

150.speaker: Astarion
150.text: Why should Cazador ascend? I'd make a much better master than him.

68.speaker: Narrator
68.text: If the Mass goes ahead, you'll be dead, not free. Cazador intends to sacrifice you.

92.speaker: Astarion
92.text: If the Mass goes ahead, you'll be dead, not free. Cazador intends to sacrifice you.

121.speaker: Astarion
121.text: Not if I kill him first. I just need to know where this 'Black Mass' is happening.

98.speaker: Dalyria
98.text: Kill the master? It's - it's not possible.

165.speaker: Astarion
165.text: You have no idea what I can do.

32.speaker: Astarion
32.text: Tell me what I need to know, or I swear you'll burn.

99.speaker: Astarion
99.text: Cazador promised you freedom? And you believed him?
